Articles.Content: KSP 1.0.5 keeps on crashing even tough i don't have any mods installed. Any ideas
Where is it crashing? I mean in the VAB? In orbit? Etc.....can you provide more information please then others can help you more.
Or maybe because your computer is slow?

1.0.5 is an old version of the game. Currently 1.1.3 is the newest, with 1.2 in public prerelease.

Your output.log file will be needed to attempt any diagnosis of the problem. If you can, please upload it to a file sharing site such as dropbox or copy it to a paste site and link here, though I would recommend also downloading v1.1.3 and trying that to see if it works any better. Keep your old v1.0.5 around in case it makes it worse!

I wouldn't recommend 1.1.3, it will make it likely make it worse, but it doesn't hurt to try I suppose as long as you make backups.

You would really be better off with the pre-release than the current release, it's more stable.

Edited October 2, 2016 by Alshain
